TEXT: The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE . He was represented before ORG , Solicitors , GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by their Agent , PERSON of ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
The applicant was in receipt of child benefit until DATE or DATE . His wife died on DATE and he remarried in DATE .

His formal claim for widows’ benefits was made in DATE and was rejected on DATE on the ground that he was not entitled to widows’ benefits because he was not a woman . The applicant requested ORG to reconsider this decision . On DATE the original decision was confirmed .
The domestic law relevant to this application is set out in PERSON v. the GPE , no . CARDINAL , § § DATE , ORG CARDINAL-IV .
